response.overview: Stroll through the Roman Forum walking down the ancient Via Sacra and visit the Colosseum during the era of Imperial Rome, toady it is possible with this splendid DVD.  The dynamic and faithful reconstructions of Ancient Rome allow the viewer to take a voyage through the past.  This virtual archeoguide contains incredibly realistic footage and animation created with the most innovative techniques in the field of 3D graphics.
response.title: Ancient Rome:  A Virtual Archeoguide
